task_search_dialog.title: Choose issue
sso_dialog.title: Authorization via SSO
sso_dialog.mode.standard.description_row: Using instruction, log in using the yc utility in your federation.
Get your iAm token and paste it into the field below.
sso_dialog.mode.web.description_row_1: Enter your Federation ID in the field below and click the "Open in new window" button.
sso_dialog.mode.web.description_row_2: Do not close the window after authorization, the link you got to will be needed in the next step.
sso_dialog.mode.web.description_row_3: Don't be alarmed by the "Unable to access the site" error, everything is going according to plan.
sso_dialog.mode.web.description_row_4: Paste the URL of the page that opens into the field below.
sso_dialog.fields.i_am_token.label: iAm token
sso_dialog.fields.federation_id.label: Federation ID
sso_dialog.fields.callback_url.label: Link to page
salary_dialog.title: Salary
salary_dialog.fields.csv.label: CSV (separator ";") (example line - userId or userEmail;cost of specialist work for 1 hour)
result_table.restrictions_text: There are restrictions on your account. <details>Details</details>
restrictions_dialog.title: There are restrictions on your account
restrictions_dialog.readonly_description: Your account is read-only, creating, editing or deleting time is not possible.
restrictions_dialog.not_admin_descriptio: Your account does not have Yandex.360 administrator rights, you cannot create working hours for other users.
organization_selector_container.descript: To find your organization ID, go to the Tracker settings page or Cloud organization settings. The ID is listed in the Organization ID for API field.

initial_config_dialog.title: Initial setup
initial_config_dialog.fields.organizatio: You can find the organization ID in the Yandex.Tracker settings.
Go to <trackerSettings>Yandex.Tracker settings</trackerSettings> or <cloudSettings>Cloud organization settings</cloudSettings>.
initial_config_dialog.fields.federation_: If your organization uses SSO to sign in, fill out this field so you don't have to enter it every time you sign in.
On the federation list page, select the required one and copy its ID into this field.
initial_config_dialog.fields.oauth_clien: OAuth Client Id (If you use login via Yandex)
To log in using Yandex.ID, you need to prepare an OAuth Client.
Create an application with the following rights:
As Callback URI, specify the main page of this application.
Access to login, first and last name, gender
initial_config_dialog.fields.allow_manua: Allow selection of federation and organization IDs during authorization
Required for one instance to work for several organizations or authorizations. In this case, the fields will be pre-filled during authorization and can be changed manually.
donate_card.dialog.title: Thank you for being with us =)
donate_card.dialog.row_1: Yandex Tracker Time Sheets was launched <tooltip><decoration>in October 2022</decoration></tooltip> and has been continuously evolving thanks to your feedback and suggestions.
donate_card.dialog.row_1_5: During this time, we've released over 30 updates that brought new features and improvements
donate_card.dialog.row_2: We're glad you're actively using the app, and we thank everyone for their trust and participation.
donate_card.dialog.row_3: The portal was and will remain free, and we'll continue releasing updates! 🚀
donate_card.title: We're 2.5 years old <dialogLink>^_^</dialogLink>
donate_card.dialog.author: Andrey Maslennikov
donate_card.dialog.author_description: Developer of Yandex Tracker Time Sheets
